ARABIC: وَإِذَا رَأَوْكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When they see you they only make a mockery of you: 'Is this the one Allah has sent as a Messenger?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When they see you they take you only in jest: "Is this the one whom God has sent as messenger?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When these people see you, they scoff at you, (saying), "Is this the man whom Allah has sent as His Messenger?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), when they see you, they will only mock you and say, "Has God really sent him as a Messengers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when they see you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) they take you but as a mockery, “Is this the one whom Allah sent as a (Noble) Messenger?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when they see you, they treat you only in mockery (saying): "Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a Messenger"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when they see you, they do not take you for aught but a mockery: Is this he whom Allah has raised to be an apostle?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And when they see thee, they take thee in mockery only: 'What, is this he whom God sent forth as a Messenger?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when they see thee (O Muhammad) they treat thee only as a jest (saying): Is this he whom Allah sendeth as a messenger?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Whenever they see you they only make a mockery of you -- "Is this the one God has sent as His Messenger?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when they behold thee, they hold thee up for mockery: is this the one whom Allah hath sent as an apostle
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When they see you they just take you in derision: ‘Is this the one whom Allah has sent as an apostle!?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When they see thee, they treat thee no otherwise than in mockery: "Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a messenger?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when they see you (O Muhammad SAW), they treat you only as a mockery (saying):"Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a Messenger?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Whenever they see you, they mock you (saying): 'Is this whom Allah has sent as a Messenger?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when they see you, they take you for nothing but mockery: “Is this the one God sent as a messenger?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when they see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a messenger?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:41]   And when they see you, they take you in mockery only, as an object of derision, saying, ‘Is this the one whom God has sent as a messenger?, as he is wont to claim? — contemptuously of him as one not worthy of being a messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when they) the disbelievers of Mecca (see thee (0 Muhammad) they treat thee only as a jest) they only speak to you in jest and derision ((saying): Is this he whom Allah sendeth as a messenger) to us?
